reviews.title: Beautifully made boot
reviews.content: I bought this in the extra wide size but unfortunately my calf could not be accommodated. I am gutted because the boot is beautifully made and exceptionally stylish and wish it could have fitted me. The postal service was brilliant too. Can't fault Clarks just my shape!

reviews.title: Comfortable great looking shoes
reviews.content: I bought these shoes 2 weeks ago and have worn them on 3 occasions since. They are shoes that look good but are also comfortable to wear. Happy that I bought them. The wide fit was a bonus.

reviews.title: The best ever!
reviews.content: I bought these for my girlfriend and she absolutly loved it. The design is very nice, they are also very confortable. She has used them as soon as they arrived!

reviews.title: Instant comfort
reviews.content: I bought these boot in two colours as the comfort level is second to none. Beautifully soft suede leather, comfortable cushion sole and great grip.

name: Pure Tone
description: Crafted from a super soft nude leather

reviews.title: Amazing shoes!
reviews.content: I bought these to wear before I go into boots. I normally wear sandals or boots as my feet are narrow and bony. These shoes are extremely comfortable too and they are a 6.5 which you often can’t get.

reviews.title: Very comfortable

reviews.content: I bought them a couple of weeks ago and I am very happy with the produsct, the website i ordered from and the fast delivery.

reviews.title: Comfortable and very well made
reviews.content: I purchased these at the Salisbury Store, the staff there were very helpful made the visit a breeze. As always Clarkes Comfort and quality, shoes always wear very well.
